title: College!
name: College!
description:
A Map by Lenar3

Places from the college days...

properties.name: Alumni Hall (NYU)
properties.description: Posted by Lenar333 3rd Ave, New York NY 10708An NYU dorm. I lived here during the summer of 2004.

properties.name: Barnes and Noble Union Square
properties.description: Posted by Lenar3 33 East 17th street, new york, ny 10003An enormous bookstore. I worked here from summer 2005 to winter 2006.

properties.name: Boveda
properties.description: Posted by Lenar3toledo, spainA small bar with big fun. Spent a number of evenings here drinking beer and eating corn nuts. Mmmm. How did I not get fat in Spain?

properties.name: Bronxville Train Station
properties.description: Posted by Lenar3bronxville, ny 10708

properties.name: Citicorp Center
properties.description: Posted by Lenar3153 East 53rd Street, new york, ny 10022Big ol, cool shaped office building. I had an internship at a literary agency here.

properties.name: Cross County Mall
properties.description: Posted by Lenar3 yonkers, nySupposedly the first mall in the country...but maybe that\'s a myth. Anyway, it\'s pretty crappy.

properties.name: Fundacion Jose Ortega y Gasset
properties.description: Posted by Lenar3Callejon San Justo, Toledo, SpainA small international school for college students in Toledo, Spain. I attended and lived here for a semester.

properties.name: Sarah Lawrence College
properties.description: Posted by Lenar31 Meadway, Bronxville, NY 10708A small, private liberal arts college where I will soon graduate! Attended from 2002 to 2006.

properties.name: The Malt House
properties.description: Posted by Lenar3yonkers, nyA gross bar we used to go to every Thursday night. Gross. But, you know, it\'s a good place to get felt up by genuine Irish men.

properties.name: The New Yorker Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Lenar3  481 8th Ave, New York, NY 10001I lived here (in student housing) during the summer of 2005. I would not recommend it.

properties.name: The Pub
properties.description: Posted by Lenar31 Meadway, Bronxville, NY 10708Where tuna sandwiches come from!

properties.name: The Ukranian Bar (no longer there)
properties.description: Posted by Lenar3East 7th St, New York, NY 10003Lower East side dive bar, gone out of business. It wasn\'t even called \'The Ukranian Bar\', but something that started with a \'V\' that my friends and I couldn\'t pronounce. There were always a ton of random, awesome people there: a mix of college students, hipsters, and folks who had probably been coming there every night for the past 15 years. I used to sit in a booth there every Friday night.
